text: Werner Dörflinger (2 October 1940 – 2 March 2021) was a German politician. He was a member of the Christian Democratic Union (CDU). He was a member of the German Bundestag from 1980 until 1998. He was born in Waldshut-Tiengen, Baden. Dörflinger died on 2 March 2021 at the age of 80.Zum Tod von Werner Dörflinger: Der ehemalige CDU-Bundestagsabgeordnete war stets eine starke Stimme in Tiengen und Bonn ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany Category:Members of the German Bundestag Category:Politicians from Baden- Württemberg
title: Werner Dörflinger
